response.overview: An erotic work depicting a bizarre party covered by a magazine reporter and the women's hidden sexual experiences. Furudate, a reporter for a weekly magazine, receives information that there is a secret women-only party and goes to cover it. The organizer is a female university student, Ryoko. At the party, a dozen young women were dancing like crazy, some completely naked. With Ryoko's permission, Furudate is able to hear about shocking sexual experiences from four women. After the interview, Ryoko calls Furudate to the center of the venue and makes him take off his clothes..
response.title: thirteen wet women
